title: language change

embed.description: This application allows you to change the language of the in-game and champ select audio for League of Legends to any of your choosing (Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Turkish, etc.) provided that the language is supported by Riot.

body: Will I get banned for using this, is there any risk to it asides from breaking the launcher

replies.body: Since there are so many cases of third party programs containing other software which can affect gameplay, [**Riot's stance on third party programs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) sits in a very use-at-your-own-risk area. If the system detects any third party programs, there's a chance that you could be punished for it.
